articles.title: Gayatri Joshi-Vikas Oberoi return to Mumbai, no case filed: Report - India Today
articles.description: 'Swades' actress Gayatri Joshi and her husband Vikas Oberoi have returned to Mumbai after the fatal Italy car crash. According to Italian media reports, no prime facie case has been filed against Oberoi.
